title: Hope Infinite – Employee Wellness Discussion with Rahul Singh
description: Adapting to the ‘New Normal’ Living a life amidst a pandemic was always tough, be it a plague or a deadly virus.

title: Hope Infinite – Employee Wellness Discussion with Vishal Thakur
description: Good Lives hosted yet another wholesome discussion with a famous name in the corporate world, Vishal Thakur, Associate Vice President, HR, TATA

title: Hope Infinite – Employee Wellness Discussion with Khalid Raza
description: While there’s no doubt that the pandemic has hit the corporates in unthinkable ways, we cannot deny the role played by the HR departments in structuring and tackling the situation using favorable strategies.
